== Meeting Minutes ==

*Jan 13, 2011:*  Tony, Michael, Richard, Frank, Elias, Andrey, David, Jeremy, Tiago, Paul, Craik, Nadia, Fred, Navjot, Senthil

  * Recognition & motivation
     * Ways to recognize outstanding contributors to the Architecture Council were discussed.
     * Action: Agreed that the best way to recognize contributors was through acknowledgements in recognition releases and Council meetings.
  * Elect chair(s)
     * Action: Support the three Co-Chairs
     * Action: Co-Chairs to organize and lead the initiatives of the Council
  * Presentation by Tiago: How to improve BigBlueButton 
     * Action: Members of the Architecture Council to provide Tiago feedback on his five ways to improve BigBlueButton
  * Presentation by Craik: Architeture goals
     * Action: Document direction, design decisions and reasoning by February 15
     * Action: Solicit feedback from the broader community
     * Action: Council to decide on architecture goals and what is core
  * Presentation by Michael: Unique differentiators that add value
     * Action: Council to define small core comprised of unique differentiators that add value to customers
     * Action: All to allocate resources for the purpose of strengthening these differentiators
  * Issues from presentations
     * Action: Initiatives will be categorized into three horizons (payoff after <12 month, 12-14 months, >24 months)    
     * Initiatives led by the Architecture Council fall in Horizon 2  
  * Product fixes
     * Action: Council to develop an architecture that solves the current voice quality problem
     * Action: Council to help Paul Wilson and Frank Horsfall attract talented coders to help fix voice quality problems
  * Testing environment and coder pool
     * Action: Frank Horsfall to report experience with the environment and the coder pool
     * Action: Frank Horsfall to provide access to the test environment to companies that contribute to BigBlueButton
